ISSUE.TITLE: Refactored the ImportResourcesFromXmlAsync method to use ToDictionaryAsync
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Refactored the ImportResourcesFromXmlAsync method in LocalizationService to use ToDictionaryAsync for efficient async query execution and dictionary creation. Removed unnecessary sorting See PR #7527

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #7541 Refactor IsEntityAclMappingExistAsync for Async Query Execution (#7512) * Use query.AnyAsync in IsEntityAclMappingExistAsync * feedback resolve * refactor

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7542 Refactored the ImportResourcesFromXmlAsync method to use ToDictionaryAsync (#7527) * Optimize ImportResourcesFromXmlAsync with ToDictionaryAsync * feedback resolve
